thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 24 of 3060
thread.title: Ronan Browne

author: Ronan Browne
title: Ronan Browne
text:
My title really says it all. I've been using RentalCars for around 5 years now and each time it is a pleasure.
I learned early on that RentalCars includes in each short car description, whether the car is at the airport rental centre (easy) or off somewhere, a bus-ride away (pain in the neck!)
It now takes me around 5 mins to book a car as I know what I'm doing.
No matter what crazy advertising I see now, I ignore and hear to RentalCars. I DID get caught there a few years ago and believed Ryanair when they said they had the most fantastic deal â€“ I ended up with such a pile of extras that I was cured forever of industry spin.
RentalCars has never let me down and I'm sticking with them.
BTW, I have NOTHING to do with them. I'm just an ordinary musician who has to hire a car from time to time...!!!
